text: 2001 FIFA World Youth Championship was held in Argentina from 17 June to 8 July. ==Qualification== The following 24 teams qualified for the 2001 FIFA World Youth Championship. Argentina qualified automatically as host. Confederation Qualifying Tournament Qualifier(s) AFC (Asia) 2000 AFC Youth Championship CAF (Africa) 2001 African Youth Championship CONCACAF (North, Central America & Caribbean) 2001 CONCACAF U-20 Tournament CONMEBOL (South America) Host nation CONMEBOL (South America) 2001 South American Youth Championship OFC (Oceania) 2001 OFC U-20 Championship UEFA (Europe) 2000 UEFA European Under-18 Football Championship :1.Teams that made their debut. :2.Czech Republic made their debut as independent nation. They were chosen as the descendant of the now-defunct Czechoslovakia, which qualified in 1983 and 1989 tournaments. ==Venues== Buenos Aires Córdoba José Amalfitani Stadium Estadio Olímpico Chateau Carreras Capacity: 49,540 Capacity: 57,000 Mendoza Rosario Estadio Malvinas Argentinas Estadio Newell's Old Boys Capacity: 40,268 Capacity: 42,000 Salta Mar del Plata Estadio Padre Ernesto Martearena Estadio José María Minella Capacity: 20,408 Capacity: 35,354 ==Results== RSSSF ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 14 2 +12 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 8 -5 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 2 4 -2 3 align=left 3 0 1 2 1 6 -5 1 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 10 1 +9 9 align=left 3 2 0 1 7 3 +4 6 align=left 3 1 0 2 5 9 -4 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 0 9 -9 0 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 1 2 0 5 3 +2 5 align=left 3 1 1 1 5 3 +2 4 align=left 3 1 1 1 1 1 0 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 4 8 -4 3 ====Group D==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 1 2 0 3 2 +1 5 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 3 0 4 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 4 -1 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 4 4 0 3 ====Group E==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 7 2 +5 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 3 0 4 align=left 3 1 1 1 5 6 -1 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 4 8 -4 0 ====Group F==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 3 1 +2 7 align=left 3 1 2 0 7 2 +5 5 align=left 3 1 1 1 5 4 +1 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 0 8 -8 0 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round16 |||2||1 |||3||2 |||2||1 |||2||1 |||1||0 |||4||0 |||2||0 |||2||0 |||3||1 |||1||0 |||2||1 |||2||1 |||5||0 |||2||0 |||3||0 |||1||0 |widescore=yes}} ==References== Category:2001 in association football Category:2000s in South America Category:Football in Argentina Category:FIFA World Youth Championship
